block.p: NETZERO, Westlake Village, Calif., named Gerald Popek chief technology officer, succeeding Ronald T. Burr, who continues as president. Mr. Popek recently held the same post at CarsDirect.com.
NETZERO, Westlake Village, Calif., named Gerald Popek chief technology officer, succeeding Ronald T. Burr, who continues as president. Mr. Popek recently held the same post at CarsDirect.com.

PHOENIX RESTAURANT GROUP, Scottsdale, Ariz., named Robert M. Langford to the post of chairman and chief executive. William J. Howard, interim chairman and chief executive, remains with the company as executive vice president. Also, W. Craig Barber was named president, succeeding William G. Cox, who continues as chief operating officer.
SOUTHCO, Concordville, Pa., named Brian M. McNeill president and chief executive, succeeding Stephen J. Kelly, who is retiring. Mr. McNeill had been executive vice president at the Danaher Corp.
